description:
Democratic representatives cite evidence of antitrust violations stemming from FTC investigation of ExxonMobil and Pioneer merger showing shale drilling companies may have colluded to drive oil prices up.

The post Oil and Gas Leases on Federal Lands in Question as Lawmakers Eye Shale Collusion Allegations appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Oil and Gas Leases on Federal Lands in Question as Lawmakers Eye Shale Collusion Allegations

description:
A new parody ExxonMobil advertisement by an Academy Award-winning director mocks humanity for letting Big Oil get away with causing one of the biggest existential threats of all time.

The post ‘All of Our Tricks Worked’: Spoof ExxonMobil Ad Nails Just How Easy It’s Been for Big Oil appeared first on DeSmog.
title: ‘All of Our Tricks Worked’: Spoof ExxonMobil Ad Nails Just How Easy It’s Been for Big Oil
